text: Drugstore Beauty Products Celebs Wore at Critics ’ Choice Awards Glam beauty doesn ’ t have to be expensive. Sure, celebs pay a hefty price to get dolled up for award shows, but we don ’ t need to when re - creating their looks. Whether through endorsement deals, brand partnerships or just ’ cause, there was a crop of stars who wore drugstore beauty at the 2018 Critics ’ Choice Award …. Read Full Article
